dmca.title: [ABUSE] COPYRIGHT INFRINGMENT - NOTICE OF LIABILITY
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 06, 2006 8:28 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] COPYRIGHT INFRINGMENT - NOTICE OF LIABILITY

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Sunday, March 05, 2006
at
22:38:01 and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to your
team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] COPYRIGHT INFRINGMENT - NOTICE OF LIABILITY

MESSAGE BODY:
Hello,
I have a person who scraped my site and is using my images. He is using your
servers. His previous host, hostgator did shut him down. He quickly found
another host. I dont have time to chase him around the net. His illegal
website is being hosting on one of your servers, I believe thru a resellers,
the domain ip is: 70.86.13.34.

His site is " *yourwebhosting.us* <http://yourwebhosting.us/>". I have
already given him warning, hostgator did shut him down, but he doesn't seem
to care, he just moves it.
My web site page that he copied  is
"*http://bikinis.w-1.us*<http://bikinis.w-1.us/>

You will see his illegal page at
*http://www.yourwebhosting.us/swimsuits/index.htm
*<http://www.yourwebhosting.us/swimsuits/index.htm>.
He is stealing my copyrighted material. He is also in violation of your
terms of service. I want his site closed down ASAP.
Thanks
Pat Mitchell
